about_me.des: I am a PhD student in Information Technology at Politecnico di Milano, Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria (DEIB), under the supervision of prof. Paolo Cremonesi. My research interests include sequential recommender systems, deep-learning and large-scale machine learning.

career.pandora_des: 'm currently a Music Science intern at Pandora Media Inc. (Oakland, CA, USA). I'm working with Tao Ye, Erik Schmidt and Puya-Hossein Vahabi on Deep Learning algorithms for sequence classification.
career.telefonica_des: I was a Research Intern at Telefonica I+D (Barcelona, Spain). I worked with Alexandros Karatzoglou and Balázs Hidasi (Gravity R&D) on Recurrent Neural Networks for Session Based Recommendation.
career.phd_des: I started my PhD in Information Technology at the Polictecnico di Milano, Milan, Italy. I'll be working on Sequential Recommender Systems.
career.master-ita_des: I received my M.Sc. with laude in Computer Science from Politecnico di Milano (Double degree with the Univirsitat Politecnica de Catalunya, Barcelona, Spain). Thesis: E-Tourism Recommender Systems - Advisor: Prof. Paolo Cremonesi
career.master-spa_des: I received my M.Sc. in Computer Science from Univirsitat Politecnica de Catalunya, Barcelona, Spain. Thesis: Methods for frequent pattern mining in data streams within the MOA system - Advisor: Prof. Ricard Gavaldá
career.bachelor_des: I received my B.Sc. in Computer Science from Politecnico di Milano. Thesis: Integration and evaluation of featureÂ­tracking algorithms within a visual SLAM system - Advisor: Prof. Matteo Matteucci
